DOC.HEADLINE: GOOD TO KNOW LOVE CAN SURVIVE THE BIG FIGHT
DOC.TEXT: " Making_up is Hard to Do " by Elizabeth Mehren in Life & Style ( April 25 ) was interestingly written and probably comforting for many couples who now know they are not alone in their major conflicts . But I want to assure young couples just beginning what they hope will be a lifelong relationship that " the five-alarm fight " is not a nasty fact of life . My first marriage of about 15 years , although ending in divorce , was free from such conflicts , and my present 19-year marriage is most satisfying and conflict-free . So , for those of you looking_forward to a long , satisfying relationship free_of dramatic ups and downs , take_heart -- it can and does happen . BEVERLY E . ADAIR Los Angeles
